vote.text: Amendment SA 510 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 510 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Scott FL to Amendment SA 935. (consideration: CR S3449-3451) To provide for drone security.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 510 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Scott FL to Amendment SA 935.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 510 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
